metadata.synopsis: Reading a bronze plaque at the feet of an unidentified statue.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *You do not recognise the language on the plaque.*
0.context: NodeContext: Reading a plaque Selûne pronounced seh-LOON-eh

1.speaker: Player
1.text: This text is ancient. A dedication to a forgotten god?
1.context: NodeContext: Mockingly reading a plaque. Selûne pronounced seh-LOON-eh
